contact.title: Contact us
contact.description: A bug? A question? A suggestion? We are here to help you.

contact.error: Oups, an error occurred while sending your message

profile.title: Profil
profile.description: Be careful, this information will be visible to all users in the final version of the application.
profile.delete_my_account_description: Once your account is deleted, all of your data will be permanently removed. This action cannot be undone.
profile.profile_update_confirmation: Are you sure you want to update your profile ?
profile.profile_delete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete your account ?

profile.public_flows_description: List of public flows created by this user

subscription.description: You can manage your subscription here. If you cancel your subscription, you will lose access to all premium features.

landing.description: We are working hard to bring you the best experience possible. We will be launching soon!
